entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Port Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hawkesbury Airport 6:51 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: NW 17 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 6 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
